name: Kotlin App Metadata File
summary: A KOTLIN_METADATA file is a metadata file created while building an Android application written using Kotlin. Under certain circumstances, Android app packagers create KOTLIN_METADATA files within an app's .APK file. Most apps do not require KOTLIN_METADATA files to function, so most developers choose to exclude them from their finalized APK files.
